physical_appearance: The image shows a black-and-white photograph. It is rectangular and it features a group of adults at the terrace. The six ladies are all sitting side by side one another, while the three men are sitting behind them. The ladies are all dressed in their ethnic costumes. Everyone is looking towards the direction where the photograph was captured. The background of the photograph shows a building, and its doors are visible.
sgcool_label_text:
This photograph shows six Indo Eurasian women in sarong kebaya and three men posing on the terrace.

With continuous improvement of camera technology, it became possible to take photographs outside a studio in the first decades of the 20th century. Many middle-class families collected photographs in albums as a way of documenting family life, or documentasi keluarga.
title_text: Photograph of six Indo Eurasian women and three men
subject_terms_1: group portraits Peranakan folk costume women (female humans) men (male humans)
subject_terms_2: Black-and-white photography Portrait photography Portraits, Group Eurasians Ethnic costume Women Men
